Title: Relates to providing assistance to small businesses in the procurement and purchase of personal protective equipment for employees
Summary: Provides assistance to small businesses in the procurement and purchase of personal protective equipment for employees; directs bulk purchasing of PPE by the division for small business; provides a tax credit for the cost of such PPE to small business employers.
LawCode: Amd §134, Ec Dev L; amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law and the tax law, in relation to providing assistance to small businesses' employers in the procurement and purchasing of personal protective equipment
